SELECT ID AS id, APP_CODE AS appCode, IP AS ip, SERVLET_PATH AS servletPath, RPC_PHASE AS rpcPhase, TRACE_ID AS traceId, SPAN_ID AS spanId, PARENT_SPAN_ID AS parentSpanId, CREATE_TIMESTAMP AS createTimestamp from log_trace_log where id <= ( #{gtValue} - #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo}-1) ) ORDER BY ID desc LIMIT 0, #{pageSize};
